pages.title: Botany Box Recipe
pages.text: $(#25228d)1 Amethyst Shard, 1 Mushroom Spores, 1 Empty Seed Packet, 75 Sun value.

pages.title: Stallers
pages.text: $(#25228d)Hypno-shrooms will make a Zombie turn around and fight for you.

text: $(br)$(#bd951a)Special: $()$(#ff0000)Nocturnal. Hypnotizes a Zombie that eats it. Hypnotizes a Small Zombie that tries to eat it, but it takes no damage.

$(br)$(#bd951a)"Zombies are our friends," asserts Hypno-shroom. "They're badly misunderstood creatures who play a valuable role in our ecology. We can and should do more to bring them round to our way of thinking."
